Container.Name: zap2xml
Container.Description:
zap2xml is a small and fast command line script that connects to a Zap2it or TVGuide account, downloads the tv listings data, and converts it to XMLTV or XTVD formatted .xml. [br][br][b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : Folder where all zap2xml config files, config templates and download cache [br] [b]/downloads[/b] : Folder where the guide.xml file will be written [br] https://registry.hub.docker.com/u/johnodon/zap2xml/ johnodon/zap2xml true false
Bridge
/mnt/cache/appdata/zap2xml/ /config rw
/mnt/cache/appdata/tvheadend/data/ /data rw
